task.question: Which of these were NOT part of God's curse on Cain?

choices.choice: a. He would have poor harvests all his life
b. He would be separated from the Lord
c. His first-born son and those of his descendants would all be born malformed
d. He would be a wanderer for life

task.answer: c. His first-born son and those of his descendants would all be born malformed

task.question: What Cain offered as a sacrifice to God?
Because Cain murdered Abel, the Lord curses him to a life as a?
How did God say He knew what Cain had done?

choices.choice: a. Lucifer told the Lord what Cain had done
c. He was watching Cain from behind a bush
d. Abel's blood cried to the Lord from the ground

task.answer: d. Abel's blood cried to the Lord from the ground

task.question: The Lord declared that if Cain were to be killed:

choices.choice: a. Cain's murderer would be hunted as Cain was hunted
b Cain's murderer would be sentenced to the same punishment
c. Cain would be avenged seven times over
d. The entire family of Cain's murderer would be killed

task.answer: c. Cain would be avenged seven times over

task.question: How was Cain's punishment that is similar to the punishment of his parents, Adam and Eve?

choices.choice: a. He was separated from God
c. God hated him from then on
d. God would send Cain to hell

task.answer: a. He was separated from God

task.question: Cain built a city and named it after his son. What was the name of this city?
Where did Cain dwell after being cast out by the Lord?
